title: Kenfigure Schema
description: Kenfigure™: a YAML spec to define Benchling configurations. © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

Metadata.title: Model instance metadata
Metadata.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

Description.description: Description of the environment and model.

Modified.description: Datetime the model was last modified.

Schema version.description: Semantic version of the KBConfig JSON schema (e.g., 1.0.0).

Diagram.title: Model instance metadata
Diagram.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

Dropdowns.title: Dropdowns and their options
Dropdowns.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

Description.description: Documentation description for the dropdown (not saved to Benchling).

Diagram.title: Diagram properties
Diagram.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Diagram.comment: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Color.description: Object color. Will override default if specified. May be a hex web color (e.g., '#0000FF' for blue) or certain well-known names are recognized.

API ID.description: API ID for the entity created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.

Entity_schemas.title: Entity schemas
Entity_schemas.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Entity_schemas.comment: All types of entity schemas (e.g., Custom enity, DNA Sequence, etc.).

items.$comment: See various TODOs. Add type-specific fields for types like DNA Sequence, etc.
items.title: Entity schema definition
items.description: Complete description of the entity schema. Some attributes only apply to certain schema types.

Warehouse name.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'System name' instead. Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchlinng/PostgreSQL compatible name.

System name.description: Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Description.description: Documentation for the entity schema. Maps to Schema Description in Benchling.

Notify.description: Causes the supplied message to be printed to the output during an import operation. Use this to tell the user to take some manual action such as configuring an embedded dashboard or setting permissions.

Entity type.description: Must match one of the Benchling-defined types.

Icon.description: Icon for the schema. Matches benchling names without any translation.

RegID display.description: Use Registry ID as display label when true.

RegID chips.description: Include Registry ID in chips when true.

Containable type.description: Entity can be transferred into containers when set to 'Entity'.

items.description: Valid enum values include symbolic names and full text versions
enum: Generate registry IDs based on entity names
Generate new registry IDs and replace name with registry ID
Generate new registry IDs, rename according to name template, and keep old name as alias
Generate new registry IDs, and replace name according to name template
Keep existing entity names as registry IDs
Generate registry IDs and names according to name template

Definition.description: Depending on Type will be text, a field name, or may be omitted if N/A.

Name template.$comment: TODO: Need to define this better. How handle pre-defiend values like separator, lot, etc.

Constraint.description: List of fields to define constraint. Maybe empty. May contain special built-in field descriptions.

Access type.description: The registered objects of this schema will have permissions that are either Registry-based (default) or Project-based.

Diagram.title: Diagram properties
Diagram.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Diagram.comment: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Color.description: Object color. Will override default if specified. May be a hex web color (e.g., '#0000FF' for blue) or certain well-known names are recognized.

items.description: A list of zero or more Fieldset names

Description.description: Documentation for the field. This is not saved to Benchling.

Tool tip.description: Field tool tip appears on hover on column headings.

Warehouse name.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'System name' instead. Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchlinng/PostgreSQL compatible name.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Parent link.description: Entity reference is a parent link when true.

Multi-select.description: Field is a multi-select field when true.

Definition.description: Name of target object if Type is a one of the link types or Dropdown.

Computed.description: Describes the computed field. Only present for computed fields.

Formula.description: Name of formula using native Benchling tokens for now.

Path.description: List of entities to get to the final entity or field. TODO-Can this just be a list. Will type ever not be Field?

Type.description: Type of path component. Only Field is valid for now.

Definition.description: Name for the given type. Usually a field name.

Property.description: The final value to return/compute at the end of the Path.

Type.description: The type of property. Normally Field, but use BASES to access the built-in Bases field.

Definition.description: The name of the field if type is Field.

API ID.description: API ID for the entity schema created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.

Fieldset_schemas.title: Fieldset schemas
Fieldset_schemas.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Fieldset_schemas.comment: All types of fieldset schemas (e.g., Custom enity, DNA Sequence, etc.). Does not currently support tool tips or parent links for fields.

items.title: Fieldset schema definition
items.description: Complete description of the fieldset schema.

System name.description: Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Description.description: Documentation for the fieldset schema. This is not saved to Benchling.

Notify.description: Causes the supplied message to be printed to the output during an import operation. Use this to tell the user to take some manual action such as setting permissions.

Entity type.description: Must match one of the Benchling-defined types. May be 'None' to enable attaching to any type of entity schema.

Category.description: If true (default), this fieldset will appear as a navigation category for end users, and an option for field definitions.

Prefix.description: The registry ID prefix. If specified, will override the prefix for all attached entity schemas.

Naming options.description: Available registration naming options. If specified, will override the naming options for all attached entity schemas.

items.description: Valid enum values include symbolic names and full text versions
enum: Generate registry IDs based on entity names
Generate new registry IDs and replace name with registry ID
Generate new registry IDs, rename according to name template, and keep old name as alias
Generate new registry IDs, and replace name according to name template
Keep existing entity names as registry IDs
Generate registry IDs and names according to name template

Definition.description: Depending on Type will be text, a field name, or may be omitted if N/A.

Name template.$comment: TODO: Need to define this better. How handle pre-defiend values like separator, lot, etc.

Constraint.description: List of fields to define constraint. Maybe empty. May contain special built-in field descriptions. If specified, will override the constraint for all attached entity schemas.

Diagram.title: Diagram properties
Diagram.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Diagram.comment: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Color.description: Object color. Will override default if specified. May be a hex web color (e.g., '#0000FF' for blue) or certain well-known names are recognized.

Description.description: Documentation for the field. This is not saved to Benchling.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Multi-select.description: Field is a multi-select field when true.

Definition.description: Name of target object if Type is a one of the link types or Dropdown.

Computed.description: Describes the computed field. Only present for computed fields.

Formula.description: Name of formula using native Benchling tokens for now.

Path.description: List of entities to get to the final entity or field. TODO-Can this just be a list. Will type ever not be Field?

Type.description: Type of path component. Only Field is valid for now.

Definition.description: Name for the given type. Usually a field name.

Property.description: The final value to return/compute at the end of the Path.

Type.description: The type of property. Normally Field, but use BASES to access the built-in Bases field.

Definition.description: The name of the field if type is Field.

API ID.description: API ID for the entity schema created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.

items.$comment: TODO: Study schemas are new and might change more often than other objects.
items.title: Study schema definition
items.description: Complete description of the study schema.

System name.description: Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Description.description: Documentation for the study schema. This is not saved to Benchling.

Prefix.description: The ID prefix for a study schema.

Type.$comment: TODO: I'm not sure that this is the right enum list for study name templates

Definition.description: Depending on Type will be text, a field name, or may be omitted if N/A.

Name template.$comment: TODO: Need to define this better. How handle pre-defiend values like separator, lot, etc.

Entry templates.description: List entry templates that are applicable to the study schema. Maybe empty.

Approval required.description: Require approval of Design before proceeding to Execution.

Study type.description: Must match one of the Benchling-defined types.

Diagram.title: Diagram properties
Diagram.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Diagram.comment: Properties solely used for diagram rendering.

Color.description: Object color. Will override default if specified. May be a hex web color (e.g., '#0000FF' for blue) or certain well-known names are recognized.

Description.description: Documentation for the field. This is not saved to Benchling.

Tool tip.description: Field tool tip appears on hover on column headings.

Warehouse name.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'System name' instead. Internal system name. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchlinng/PostgreSQL compatible name.

System name.description: Internal system name for the field. Default will be an automatic conversion of Name to a Benchling/PostgreSQL compatible name.

Multi-select.description: Field is a multi-select field when true.

Definition.description: Name of target object if Type is a one of the link types or Dropdown. May optionally point to a dropdown if type is Integer or Decimal.

Snapshot.description: Describes the snapshot computation if this is a snapshot computed field.

Formula.description: Name of formula using native Benchling tokens for now. TODO-For now, leave the items for arguments unspecified until this matures more. Add filters and other features.

Arguments.description: Formula arguments. These are dependent on the particular formula.

Steps.description: Lookup steps. Currently supports a list of 2 field values. First must be an entity field in the current schema. Second must be a field on the schema pointed to by step 1.

API ID.description: API ID for the entity created during an export operation. This is ignored for import operations.

Feature_flags.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Feature_flags.comment: Back-end feature flag settings. Must be fetched and changed by Benchling. Use feature_flags.py to convert to/from csv

Template_collections.title: Template collections

items.title: Template collection definition
items.description: Complete description of the template collection.

Description.description: Description of the template collection.

Owner.description: Owner (an organization) of the template collection.

Notify.description: Causes the supplied message to be printed to the output during an import operation. Use this to tell the user to take some manual action such as configuration access rights.

Templates.title: Templates
Templates.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Templates.comment: For some reason, Benchling allows duplicate templates, so uniqueItems is false.

items.title: Entry template definition
items.comment: Does not support template content or default schema values yet.

Description.description: Description of the template.

Collection.description: Name of the template collection that the template belongs to.

Schema.description: Name of the entry schema attached to the template.

Fill-in only.description: If true, entries created from this template will be locked. Users can only fill in tables, text boxes, checkboxes, and files. If false (or omitted), entries created from this template can be modified by end users.

Notify.description: Causes the supplied message to be printed to the output during an import operation. Use this to tell the user to take some manual action such as configuration access rights.

Sub_templates.title: Sub templates
Sub_templates.description: © 2025 Go2 Software LLC. Licensed under the Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By). 'Kenfigure' is a trademark of Go2 Software LLC. Unauthorized use is prohibited.
Sub_templates.comment: For some reason, Benchling allows duplicate sub-templates, so uniqueItems is false.

Description.description: Description of the sub-template.

Collection.description: Name of the template collection that the sub-template belongs to.

Notify.description: Causes the supplied message to be printed to the output during an import operation. Use this to tell the user to take some manual action such as configuration access rights.
